name: SHIVER (itch) (Shurrikane)
description:
Your research field team is caught is an unnatural blizzard. Lost and alone, you need to find safety. SHIVER is a survival game about withstanding the cold, finding methods to stay warm and following in your assistants footsteps back to safety.

This games focuses on building an immersive experience of being lost in the cold. It comes with custom music and an unlockable hard mode after the first level.

Controls:
WASD to move
Shift to sprint
E to interact
Space to jump
